stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Matrix Analyzer, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text:
When the Runner encounters Matrix Analyzer, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Matrix Analyzer
